title: Spencer: Bad Boy Cage Fighter
description: Spencer Sinclair Fuckingtastic.I’m a fighter.I’m not a babysitter.The girl is wild.She’s rude.She’s spoiled.She’s gorgeous.She’s light.She’s mine.What the hell.* * * * Dior Ford I’m a grown-ass woman.Father treats me like a child.I don’t need a babysitter.The new guard is hot.He’s serious.He’s dark.He’s menacing.I’m going to drive him insane.HEA . . . Dark Alphas MC Romance, standalone, no cliff hangers.
author: P.T. Macias
